#summary A list of the models that are currently available in Apollo-WS.

= Apollo-WS Available Models=

The following epidemic models are currently available to Apollo-WS users:

Anthrax Models:
  * BARD Simulator - based on the [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/17948918 bayesian aerosol release detector].
  * Compartmental Anthrax Model

Influenza Models:
  * FRED Influenza Model- Developed at the Public Health Dynamics Lab at the University of Pittsburgh [https://midas.psc.edu/]
  * H1N1 SEIR Model - Developed at the University of Pittsburgh

= Models that are currently in the process of being connected to Apollo =

Large Scale Agent Model (LSAM)
